# Battle of Chuncheon

| combatant2  =
| commander1  = Kim Kwang-hyop Lee Cheong-song Jeon Woo Park Sung-chul
| commander2  = Kim Jong-oh
| strength1   = II Corps
*2nd Infantry Division
*7th Infantry Division
*15th Infantry Division
| strength2   =6th Infantry Division16th Artillery Battalion
| casualties1 =
| casualties2 =
}}
The Battle of Chuncheon () was one of a series of coordinated attacks beginning on 25 June 1950 that marked the beginning of the Korean War.
